sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' //redux import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {getSpecificProductById} from '../../redux/actions/product' import './index.css' class ProductDetail extends Component { componentDidMount(){ //get product info when the page loads this.props.getSpecificProductById(this.props.location.state.id) console.log(this.props.productState); } render() { const {isLoading, productObj} = this.props.productDetailState const {productName, description, price, imgURL, numberInStock} = productObj || {} return (

{productName}

{description}

${price}

Price: ${price}

Stock: {numberInStock}

Quantity:

) } } export default connect(state => ({ productDetailState : state.productState }), { getSpecificProductById } )(ProductDetail)
